channel.title: gossiperl on gruchalski.com

item.title: Gossiperl at EUC 2015 and next steps
item.description: Wow. It’s difficult to believe it’s been almost a week since I gave a talk about gossip protocols at Erlang User Conference in Stockholm. It was a fantastic event, great agenda, great topics, fantastic networking. EUC is one of those events you should attend, you will not regret it. No matter if you are interested in Erlang/Elixir or not. Big “Thank You” to all who made it happen. EUC2015 was also a place of first public appearance of Gossiperl.
